item.title: Markdown css per paragraph?
item.description: ##11:45 Saturday 07 March 2015 JST## Markdown allows me to write without having to worry about paragraph tags and other markup. I’ve got loads of experience writing HTML4 markup so it’s a welcome reprieve. HowEVer, I’d like the option of using specific CSS on certain paragraphs, specifically for when I write my dreams. My convention is to have green italics for dreams, green without italics for lucid dreams (iirc from my old school journal).
